casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Joshua BOLEN No. 193P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 10, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Joshua Bolen, for Bolen, Joshua.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 9th of July 2018 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Stokes County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of July 2018."
